item.title: Auto Dice 200m gamble command need help!
item.dc:creator: @Null_Amount N_A
item.description:
@Null_Amount wrote:

You should use Misc.random(99) + 1 instead of Misc.random(100) so it’s actually 1-100 instead of 0-100 (unless you meant for it to be 0 - 100.)

Read full topic

item.title: Auto Dice 200m gamble command need help!
item.dc:creator: @dylaster5 dylaster5
item.description:
@dylaster5 wrote:

I am trying to code an auto dice command this is what I’ve come up with so far but I get a compiling error saying cant find symbol: Deleteitem
Idk if someone csn use this as a base and fix it for me but if my whole program is all wron please tell me what to do instead

THIS IS BEING CODED INTO AND ALLSTAR BASE

[code]if(command.equalsIgnoreCase(“200mgamble”))
{
if ((playerHasItemAmount(995, 200000000) == false)) {
sendMessage(
“You do not have 200m in your inventory.”);
}
else if ((playerHasItemAmount(995, 200000000) == true))
{
DeleteItem(995, getItemSlot(995), 200);
int dice = (misc.random(100));
{
if (dice >= 61 )
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (""+playerName+" has just done ::200mgamble and won 400m!!!");
addItem(995, 400000000);
}
{
if (dice <= 60 )
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (""+playerName+" has just done ::200mgamble and lost!");
DeleteItem(995, GetItemSlot(995), 200000000);}

}

} [/code]

Read full topic
item.source: Auto Dice 200m gamble command need help!
